edu.luc.cs.trull.demo.battleship
Class BattleShip

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Panel
              java.applet.Applet
                  javax.swing.JApplet
                      edu.luc.cs.trull.demo.Applet
                          edu.luc.cs.trull.demo.battleship.BattleShip
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, EventLabels, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class BattleShip
extends Applet
implements EventLabels

A simple implementation of two ships. The user can place the two ships and shoot at them from either ship. 

  Main:

    local PLACE1 PLACE2 in
       rename PLACE to PLACE1 in BattleShip(5, 2)
    || rename PLACE to PLACE2 in BattleShip(3, 3)

  BattleShip:

    await PLACE -> { place ship }
      loop
        await SHOT ->
          switch { miss/hit/sunk ? }
            hit  -> emit HIT
            sunk -> emit SUNK
            miss -> done

view source

run applet

See Also:
